DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION INITIATIVE - REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL

PROJECT OVERVIEW
The organization seeks a comprehensive digital transformation solution to modernize legacy systems, implement cloud-native architecture, and establish enterprise-grade security frameworks.

KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS (KPIs)
- System uptime: 99.9% availability
- Performance improvement: 40% faster processing
- Cost reduction: 25% operational savings
- Security incidents: Zero tolerance policy
- User adoption: 95% within 6 months

EVALUATION CRITERIA
- Technical architecture quality (30%)
- Security and compliance framework (25%)
- Implementation timeline and methodology (20%)
- Cost effectiveness and ROI (15%)
- Vendor experience and references (10%)

BUDGET AND PROCUREMENT
- Total project budget: $8.5M allocated
- Payment structure: Milestone-based with 30% upfront
- Contract duration: 18-month implementation
- Procurement process: Formal RFP with 3-stage evaluation
- Budget approval: CFO and Board of Directors required

GOVERNANCE AND DECISION MAKING
- Steering Committee: CTO, CFO, CISO, VP Operations
- Final approval: CEO and Board of Directors
- Decision timeline: 8 weeks evaluation period
- Vendor presentations: Required for top 3 finalists
- Technical due diligence: Independent third-party assessment

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- Cloud platform: AWS/Azure/GCP compatibility required
- API standards: RESTful APIs with OpenAPI 3.0 specification
- Integration: Seamless connectivity with existing ERP systems
- Data migration: Zero-downtime migration strategy
- Scalability: Support for 10x growth over 5 years
- Security: SOC2 Type II, ISO 27001, GDPR compliance
- Mobile: Native iOS and Android applications
- Analytics: Real-time dashboards and predictive analytics

STRATEGIC THEMES
- Digital-first customer experience
- Operational excellence through automation
- Data-driven decision making culture
- Sustainable technology practices
- Innovation acceleration and time-to-market
- Employee empowerment through modern tools

RISK AND COMPLIANCE
- Regulatory compliance: SOX, HIPAA, PCI DSS requirements
- Data privacy: GDPR, CCPA full compliance mandatory
- Business continuity: 99.9% uptime SLA with penalties
- Cybersecurity: Advanced threat protection and monitoring
- Audit requirements: Quarterly security audits
- Insurance: $10M cyber liability coverage required
- Vendor risk assessment: Comprehensive third-party evaluation

INNOVATION AND PROOF OF CONCEPT
- AI/ML integration: Predictive analytics capabilities
- IoT connectivity: Support for 100,000+ connected devices
- Blockchain exploration: Supply chain transparency pilot
- Advanced analytics: Real-time business intelligence
- Innovation lab: Dedicated environment for experimentation
- Proof of concept: 3-month pilot program required
- Technology roadmap: 5-year innovation strategy alignment
